name: init(exactly:)
desc: Creates a new instance from the given value, if it can be represented exactly.Required. Default implementations provided.

items.name: init?<Source>(exactly: Source)
items.desc: Creates a new instance from the given value, if it can be represented exactly.

items.name: init?<Source>(exactly: Source)
items.desc: Creates a new value, if the given integer can be represented exactly.

declaration: init?<Source>(exactly value: Source) where Source : BinaryFloatingPoint
